name: Tank Breaker 2
description:
Enjoy single or multi play for free!
Defeat all enermies with 10 types of tanks, upgrade and item

- Enjoy 60 stages Single play

- Play online game with blue or red team!

- Hard to defeat all enermy by yourself! User your team!

- Use item to defeat lots of enermies

- Upgrade your tank and destroy all of them!

- Warning your network connection during multi play, it could be a reason to stop

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KUMMI3o5144&feature=youtu.be
